release_notes: IMPROVED: Consolidated notification system - removed popup toasts, status bar only
ENHANCED: Color-coded status messages - green (success), red (error), orange (warning), blue (info)
BETTER UX: Less intrusive notifications with auto-reset to 'Ready' after 5 seconds
SIMPLIFIED: Unified notification method improves consistency and reduces visual clutter
TECHNICAL: Removed ToastManager from codebase, consolidated 90+ notification calls
